Plural means ______________. In French, to make most nouns plural, you add –s, as you do in English.  If the noun already ends in –s, you  do not  add another –s in the plural. The plural form of the definite articles  le ,  la ,  l’  is   ____.  The «s» of les is not pronounced when followed by a consonant.
